attributes.action: Mother & Father to a stillborn baby boy caused by incompetence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2007 our baby died due to incompetence, one particular student nurse lied to her collegues about some results leading to the sad and unexpected death of our darling baby boy.

Sadly I hear on a weekly basis of someone who has experienced only a negative service by PAH, Harlow

Something has to be done......Now!

So please sign my petition

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
